item.title: DNA pioneer James Watson dies at 97
item.description: The Nobel Prize winner felt ostracised by the scientific community over his comments on race and intelligence.

item.title: Sabalenka beats Anisimova in 'incredible match' to reach Riyadh final
item.description: Aryna Sabalenka says winning an "incredible" semi-final against Amanda Anisimova will be "great preparation" for facing Elena Rybakina in Saturday's W...

item.title: Ex-footballer Joey Barton guilty over 'grossly offensive' X posts
item.description: The former footballer directed posts on X towards Jeremy Vine and pundits Lucy Ward and Eni Aluko.

item.title: Israel receives coffin Hamas says contains body of Gaza hostage
item.description: If the body is identified as a hostage, five dead hostages will remain in Gaza and still need to be returned under a ceasefire deal.

item.title: James Watson: Controversial discoverer of 'the secret of life'
item.description: James Watson, the godfather of DNA who discovered the "secrets of life" has died aged 97.
